2.2.0

  • Added an option to set the starting index, useful to mitigate conflicts with third-party CSS files.
  • Performance improvements, including O(1) lookup of cached values rather than O(n), aborting PostCSS walk altogether when a negative index is found, and not running an optimize step if there are no z-index declarations.

2.1.1

  • Fixes an issue where all positive indices before a negative index were transformed (thanks to @niccai).

2.1.0

  • Now aborts early when encountering negative indices, making the transform safer overall.

2.0.1

  • Improved performance of the module by sorting/deduplicating values in one pass instead of per-value (thanks to @pgilad).

2.0.0

  • Upgraded to PostCSS 5.

1.1.3

  • Improved performance by iterating the AST in a single pass and caching nodes for the second iteration.

1.1.2

  • Documentation/metadata tweaks for plugin guidelines compatibility.

1.1.1

  • Corrected dependency tree when installing from npm.

1.1.0

  • Now uses the PostCSS 4.1 plugin API.

1.0.1

  • Adds a JSHint config, code tidied up.

1.0.0

  • Initial release.
